products.title: Kerry Paradise Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Combining the colour of unblemished sapphires and the soft resilience of its polyester fabric, this blind is undeniably the greatest thing ever invented by man. No joke. Being such a rich colour with so much personality, that this blind will make your home better in every regard is a given. The only danger to ordering this blind is that houseguests may or may not try to steal it, but if they are willing to endanger your friendship for a window blind, then they arent worth it honey.

products.title: Capri Vision Paradise Green Day And Night Blind
products.description: Give your interior a burst of fresh colour with the capri vision paradise green day and night roller blind. Bright and cheerful, this blind will give visual appeal to your space as well as being a practical and versatile option for light control. Designed to fully close for complete privacy or alternatively, it can be semi opened to retain a sense of privacy whilst letting plenty of natural light shine through.

products.title: Paradise Willow Green Roman Blind
products.description: Paradise, a beautiful and special roman, the leaf style giving that bit more elagance. At an affordable price the blind would be wonderful in your house. This cream roman blind has a bold leaf print that will be a great statement piece in any room in your home. Product id: db-arom0839 fabric colour: willow green material: 82% polyester 18% cotton headrail: white metal headrail control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes paradise willow green roman blind in cream/blue/green/multicoloured.

products.title: Paradise Slate Roman Blind
products.description: Paradise, a beautiful and special roman, the leaf style giving that bit more elagance. At an affordable price the blind would be wonderful in your house. This black roman blind has a bold cream and blue leaf print that will be a great statement piece in any room in your home. Product id: db-arom0837 fabric colour: slate material: 82% polyester 18% cotton headrail: white metal headrail control type: sidewinder chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes paradise slate roman blind in black/multicoloured.

products.title: Paradise, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.description: The autumn country tones of the paradise in auburn are pretty and understated, displaying an array of wispy florals and foliage across a white base. With pinks, greens, and yellows included in the palette, this is a subtly colourful piece that will work in a variety of dcor schemes. Team the auburn with apple greens in the kitchen, where some chalk paint will make over your units, and creamy walls will offset the green beautifully.

products.title: Paradise, Fennel - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring fennel green tones, alongside yellows and whites, this pretty offering from the paradise range is aptly named. The lush foliage and florals depicted are reminiscent of a country paradise, making this a work of art in its own right. Create a serene utopia for your guests to rest up in by using the fennel in your spare bedroom. Surround with similar greens, accenting occasionally with yellows and whites, and keep the general look and feel of the room tranquil and relaxing.

products.title: Paradise, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: The naturally toned paradise in saxon blue offers gorgeous shades of green and blue on a soft white background. And, made from 100% cotton, its smooth fabric sits neatly in attractive roman folds, looking right at home wherever it's hung. Use the saxon blue to breathe colour into the living room, surrounding it with matching cool blues, as well as the occasional green to accent. Add plenty of fresh cotton and linen fabrics in the form of throws and cushions for extra cosiness.
